description: Discover the best hotels in Desaru, Malaysia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Malaysia Five-Star Paradise with Beachfront Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Discover a five-star oceanfront paradise with a stay at the luxurious Anantara Desaru Coast Resort & Villas - an oasis amid lush tropical gardens, lagoons and golden Malaysian beaches. Experience opulent days relaxing by the beachfront infinity pool, before retreating to the Lagoon Pool Bar for a cocktail to watch the sun set over the turquoise waters. Indulge in a variety of dining experiences at the two onsite restaurants or organise an intimate beachside bespoke meal for two under the stars.

seo.title: Hotels in Desaru - Malaysia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Desaru, Malaysia with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
